scripts.dev: concurrently 'FLASK_APP=backend.app FLASK_DEBUG=1 flask run --port 51730' 'cd frontend && OIKOS_API_URL=http://localhost:51730 yarn dev'
scripts.bootstrap: pip install -r backend/requirements.txt && yarn install --cwd frontend && yarn install
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/data/ backend/__pycache__/ frontend/node_modules/ frontend/dist/ frontend/build/ node_modules/ yarn.lock frontend/yarn.lock
